sendcrock.text: Dear @,^Remember the whole family used to make kimchi during the winter back home? ^I'm sending you this crock so you can make delicious kimchi!^ -Mom
kimchifriedrice.text: I almost forgot! ^I bet you've been craving for this!^ -Mom
kimchitunastew.text: Nothing can beat the spicy hearty broth during the cold winter day. ^Always get yourself warm @!^ -Mom
kimchiporkstew.text: Remember that me and your mother fought with tuna or pork in kimchi stew? ^ @, It's hard to work but eats meat hard!^ -Dad
